title: Uber Eats alum lands $14M seed from a16z to fix WhatsApp chaos for LatAm’s doctors
description: Leona Health built an AI co-pilot to manage the flood of patient messages Latin American doctors receive on WhatsApp.
content: Leona Health built an AI co-pilot to manage the flood of patient messages Latin American doctors receive on WhatsApp.
